<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Carry out call site analysis, in order to evaluate inlinability.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// NOTE: the type is currently used as implementation detail of functions such</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// as llvm::getInlineCost. Note the function&#95;ref constructor parameters - the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// expectation is that they come from the outer scope, from the wrapper</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// functions. If we want to support constructing CallAnalyzer objects where</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// lambdas are provided inline at construction, or where the object needs to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// otherwise survive past the scope of the provided functions, we need to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// revisit the argument types.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// While we walk the potentially-inlined instructions, we build up and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// maintain a mapping of simplified values specific to this callsite. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// idea is to propagate any special information we have about arguments to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// this call through the inlinable section of the function, and account for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// likely simplifications post-inlining. The most important aspect we track</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// is CFG altering simplifications -- when we prove a basic block dead, that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// can cause dramatic shifts in the cost of inlining a function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aae6549033be6c24910989a2f8d4952b0"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;Value &#42;, Constant &#42;&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aae6549033be6c24910989a2f8d4952b0">SimplifiedValues</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Keep track of the values which map back (through function arguments) to</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a3be51cd1c47211784cfe67351f08f005"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;Value &#42;, AllocaInst &#42;&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a3be51cd1c47211784cfe67351f08f005">SROAArgValues</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a717d4e1b4a02858b89c6d30a00e193da"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a717d4e1b4a02858b89c6d30a00e193da">dump</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Considering forming a binary search, we should find the number of nodes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which is same as the number of comparisons when lowered. For a given</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// number of clusters, n, we can define a recursive function, f(n), to find</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the number of nodes in the tree. The recursion is :</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// f(n) = 1 + f(n/2) + f (n - n/2), when n &gt; 3,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and f(n) = n, when n &lt;= 3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This will lead a binary tree where the leaf should be either f(2) or f(3)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// when n &gt; 3  So, the number of comparisons from leaves should be n, while</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the number of non-leaf should be :</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   2^(log2(n) - 1) - 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   = 2^log2(n) &#42; 2^-1 - 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   = n / 2 - 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Considering comparisons from leaf and non-leaf nodes, we can estimate the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// number of comparisons in a simple closed form :</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   n + n / 2 - 1 = n &#42; 3 / 2 - 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-inlinecost-cpp-/#a374e842507732fae7dbbd03f9a137759"><span class="doxyHighlight">int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-inlinecost-cpp-/#a374e842507732fae7dbbd03f9a137759">getExpectedNumberOfCompare</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumCaseCluster) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 3 &#42; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">int64&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(NumCaseCluster) / 2 - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// FIXME: if it is necessary to derive from InlineCostCallAnalyzer, note</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the FIXME in onLoweredCall, when instantiating an InlineCostCallAnalyzer</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ComputeFullInlineCost;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Ignore the threshold when finalizing analysis.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IgnoreThreshold;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// True if the cost-benefit-analysis-based inliner is enabled.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CostBenefitAnalysisEnabled;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Inlining cost measured in abstract units, accounts for all the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// instructions expected to be executed for a given function invocation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Instructions that are statically proven to be dead based on call-site</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// arguments are not counted here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The cumulative cost at the beginning of the basic block being analyzed.  At</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the end of analyzing each basic block, &quot;Cost - CostAtBBStart&quot; represents</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the size of that basic block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CostAtBBStart = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The static size of live but cold basic blocks.  This is &quot;static&quot; in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sense that it&#39;s not weighted by profile counts at all.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ColdSize = 0;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SROACostSavings = 0;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return true if \\p Call is a cold callsite.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/globalopt-cpp/#a652ede21e988a4de569cdbc7863ea234">isColdCallSite</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfo">BlockFrequencyInfo</a> &#42;CallerBFI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Update Threshold based on callsite properties such as callee</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfo">BlockFrequencyInfo</a> &#42;CallerBFI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Handle a capped &#39;int&#39; increment for Cost.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> addCost(int64&#95;t Inc) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Inc = std::clamp&lt;int64&#95;t&gt;(Inc, INT&#95;MIN, INT&#95;MAX);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> = std::clamp&lt;int64&#95;t&gt;(Inc + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>, INT&#95;MIN, INT&#95;MAX);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> onDisableSROA(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/allocainst">AllocaInst</a> &#42;Arg)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> override </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CostIt = SROAArgCosts.find(Arg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CostIt == SROAArgCosts.end())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><span class="doxyHighlight">    addCost(CostIt-&gt;second);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SROACostSavings -= CostIt-&gt;second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SROACostSavingsLost += CostIt-&gt;second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SROAArgCosts.erase(CostIt);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> onDisableLoadElimination()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> override </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><span class="doxyHighlight">    addCost(LoadEliminationCost);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><span class="doxyHighlight">    LoadEliminationCost = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> onCallBaseVisitStart(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> override </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (std::optional&lt;int&gt; AttrCallThresholdBonus =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a24380444e7b6b5af3e742282c87d4219">getStringFnAttrAsInt</a>(<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;call-threshold-bonus&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (std::optional&lt;int&gt; AttrCallCost =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a24380444e7b6b5af3e742282c87d4219">getStringFnAttrAsInt</a>(<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;call-inline-cost&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><span class="doxyHighlight">      addCost(&#42;AttrCallCost);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Prevent further processing of the call since we want to override its</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inline cost, not just add to it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> onCallArgumentSetup(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> override </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> onLoadRelativeIntrinsic()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> override </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><span class="doxyHighlight">    addCost(3 &#42; <a href="#abd4fe6436780bc5172e1f00bd5c3ceaf">InstrCost</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#adbe0f81b770474e05444f01f04ef40d8">onLoweredCall</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aa0d73af9a3aaefb80f59550a218c40f2">F</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><span class="doxyHighlight">                     </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsIndirectCall)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> override </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We account for the average 1 instruction per call argument setup here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><span class="doxyHighlight">    addCost(<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>.arg&#95;size() &#42; <a href="#abd4fe6436780bc5172e1f00bd5c3ceaf">InstrCost</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we have a constant that we are calling as a function, we can peer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// through it and see the function target. This happens not infrequently</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// during devirtualization and so we want to give it a hefty bonus for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inlining, but cap that bonus in the event that inlining wouldn&#39;t pan out.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pretend to inline the function, with a custom threshold.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsIndirectCall &amp;&amp; BoostIndirectCalls) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IndirectCallParams = Params;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><span class="doxyHighlight">      IndirectCallParams.DefaultThreshold =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/inlineconstants/#a6e878d84d424326fd6132b320f075c97">InlineConstants::IndirectCallThreshold</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      /// FIXME: if InlineCostCallAnalyzer is derived from, this may need</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      /// to instantiate the derived class.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/inlinecostcallanalyzer/#a55d07c23093e29dd03456b0197d64f69">InlineCostCallAnalyzer</a> CA(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aa0d73af9a3aaefb80f59550a218c40f2">F</a>, <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>, IndirectCallParams, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a453497ae3e6c0033f5609b932d472b11">TTI</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#acbdd4c0e06dc866ad2e68d57e194743e">GetAssumptionCache</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a9d83f245e02c2d598444b73ea9a05459">GetBFI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#abef6e3800bbcc3d80dca77ce58b0eaa8">GetTLI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a8c79183f67d088e0c9cd34511c3f848d">PSI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aeee19cfe3d54e41a640e29f36056ecfb">ORE</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CA.<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a75514cc4632af88b58a31912c8bd9ecc">analyze</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineresult/#af279070ae6350a3acd0e80ba7da7d397">isSuccess</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We were able to inline the indirect call! Subtract the cost from the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// threshold to get the bonus we want to apply, but don&#39;t go below zero.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> -= std::max(0, CA.<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/inlinecostcallanalyzer/#acb1d0df80d9694dec13c124cacfba9fb">getThreshold</a>() - CA.<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/inlinecostcallanalyzer/#a46fe03997116e029acecf085b9fd92bd">getCost</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise simply add the cost for merely making the call.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><span class="doxyHighlight">      addCost(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a453497ae3e6c0033f5609b932d472b11">TTI</a>.getInlineCallPenalty(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aaf27e0fe73330b76c1ffd00ea2116e78">CandidateCall</a>.getCaller(), <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       <a href="#a163d0cfa6f179b946914da015582985f">CallPenalty</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> onFinalizeSwitch(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> JumpTableSize, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumCaseCluster,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If suitable for a jump table, consider the cost for the table size and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// branch to destination.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Maximum valid cost increased in this function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (JumpTableSize) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Suppose a default branch includes one compare and one conditional</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// branch if it&#39;s reachable.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><span class="doxyHighlight">        addCost(2 &#42; <a href="#abd4fe6436780bc5172e1f00bd5c3ceaf">InstrCost</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Suppose a jump table requires one load and one jump instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"><span class="doxyHighlight">      int64&#95;t JTCost =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">int64&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(JumpTableSize) &#42; <a href="#abd4fe6436780bc5172e1f00bd5c3ceaf">InstrCost</a> + 2 &#42; <a href="#abd4fe6436780bc5172e1f00bd5c3ceaf">InstrCost</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><span class="doxyHighlight">      addCost(JTCost);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NumCaseCluster &lt;= 3) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Suppose a comparison includes one compare and one conditional branch.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can reduce a set of instructions if the default branch is</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="833"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!CallerBFI)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="834"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="835"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="836"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For now, limit to hot call site.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="837"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a8c79183f67d088e0c9cd34511c3f848d">PSI</a>-&gt;isHotCallSite(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aaf27e0fe73330b76c1ffd00ea2116e78">CandidateCall</a>, CallerBFI))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="838"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="839"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="840"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure we have a nonzero entry count.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="841"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EntryCount = <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aa0d73af9a3aaefb80f59550a218c40f2">F</a>.getEntryCount();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="842"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!EntryCount || !EntryCount-&gt;getCount())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="843"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="844"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="845"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfo">BlockFrequencyInfo</a> &#42;CalleeBFI = &amp;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a9d83f245e02c2d598444b73ea9a05459">GetBFI</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aa0d73af9a3aaefb80f59550a218c40f2">F</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="846"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!CalleeBFI)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="847"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="848"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="849"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="864"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="865"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="866"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OverrideCycleSavingsAndSizeForTesting(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;CycleSavings, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="867"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (std::optional&lt;int&gt; AttrCycleSavings = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a24380444e7b6b5af3e742282c87d4219">getStringFnAttrAsInt</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="868"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aaf27e0fe73330b76c1ffd00ea2116e78">CandidateCall</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;inline-cycle-savings-for-test&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CycleSavings = &#42;AttrCycleSavings;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="870"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="871"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="872"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (std::optional&lt;int&gt; AttrRuntimeCost = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a24380444e7b6b5af3e742282c87d4219">getStringFnAttrAsInt</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="873"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aaf27e0fe73330b76c1ffd00ea2116e78">CandidateCall</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;inline-runtime-cost-for-test&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="874"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> = &#42;AttrRuntimeCost;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="875"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="876"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="877"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="878"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Determine whether we should inline the given call site, taking into account</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="879"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// both the size cost and the cycle savings.  Return std::nullopt if we don&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="880"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// have sufficient profiling information to determine.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::optional&lt;bool&gt; costBenefitAnalysis() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!CostBenefitAnalysisEnabled)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::nullopt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="884"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// buildInlinerPipeline in the pass builder sets HotCallSiteThreshold to 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for the prelink phase of the AutoFDO + ThinLTO build.  Honor the logic by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// falling back to the cost-based metric.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Improve this hacky condition.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Threshold == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::nullopt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a9d83f245e02c2d598444b73ea9a05459">GetBFI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfo">BlockFrequencyInfo</a> &#42;CalleeBFI = &amp;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a9d83f245e02c2d598444b73ea9a05459">GetBFI</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aa0d73af9a3aaefb80f59550a218c40f2">F</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(CalleeBFI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="895"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The cycle savings expressed as the sum of InstrCost</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// multiplied by the estimated dynamic count of each instruction we can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// avoid.  Savings come from the call site cost, such as argument setup and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the call instruction, as well as the instructions that are folded.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We use 128-bit APInt here to avoid potential overflow.  This variable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="902"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// should stay well below 10^^24 (or 2^^80) in practice.  This &quot;worst&quot; case</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="903"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// assumes that we can avoid or fold a billion instructions, each with a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="904"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// profile count of 10^^15 -- roughly the number of cycles for a 24-hour</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="905"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// period on a 4GHz machine.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="906"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> CycleSavings(128, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;BB : <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aa0d73af9a3aaefb80f59550a218c40f2">F</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> CurrentSavings(128, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : BB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst">BranchInst</a> &#42;BI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;BranchInst&gt;</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Count a conditional branch as savings if it becomes unconditional.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BI-&gt;isConditional() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="914"><span class="doxyHighlight">              <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4956305191cdba7f9995569d011a5ab7">isa&#95;and&#95;nonnull&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aae6549033be6c24910989a2f8d4952b0">SimplifiedValues</a>.lookup(BI-&gt;getCondition()))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><span class="doxyHighlight">            CurrentSavings += <a href="#abd4fe6436780bc5172e1f00bd5c3ceaf">InstrCost</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="917"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="918"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/switchinst">SwitchInst</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;SwitchInst&gt;</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="919"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c36204b4ae6bbd9edda208f271aa569">isa&#95;and&#95;present&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aae6549033be6c24910989a2f8d4952b0">SimplifiedValues</a>.lookup(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>-&gt;getCondition())))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="920"><span class="doxyHighlight">            CurrentSavings += <a href="#abd4fe6436780bc5172e1f00bd5c3ceaf">InstrCost</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="921"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Value&gt;</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="922"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Count an instruction as savings if we can fold it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="923"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aae6549033be6c24910989a2f8d4952b0">SimplifiedValues</a>.count(V)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="924"><span class="doxyHighlight">            CurrentSavings += <a href="#abd4fe6436780bc5172e1f00bd5c3ceaf">InstrCost</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="925"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="926"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="927"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="928"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="929"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a854ac9cfc31bb306b1495a508707dc26">ProfileCount</a> = CalleeBFI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfo/#a45e6b2c5c4e59ddc05ad9a2685706e75">getBlockProfileCount</a>(&amp;BB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="930"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CurrentSavings &#42;= &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a854ac9cfc31bb306b1495a508707dc26">ProfileCount</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="931"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CycleSavings += CurrentSavings;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="932"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="933"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="934"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute the cycle savings per call.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="935"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EntryProfileCount = <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aa0d73af9a3aaefb80f59550a218c40f2">F</a>.getEntryCount();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="936"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(EntryProfileCount &amp;&amp; EntryProfileCount-&gt;getCount());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="937"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EntryCount = EntryProfileCount-&gt;getCount();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="938"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CycleSavings += EntryCount / 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="939"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CycleSavings = CycleSavings.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a05d674becc60ba4ef8cd4dd4d38ac27a">udiv</a>(EntryCount);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="940"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="941"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute the total savings for the call site.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="942"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;CallerBB = <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aaf27e0fe73330b76c1ffd00ea2116e78">CandidateCall</a>.getParent();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="943"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfo">BlockFrequencyInfo</a> &#42;CallerBFI = &amp;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a9d83f245e02c2d598444b73ea9a05459">GetBFI</a>(&#42;(CallerBB-&gt;getParent())));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="944"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CycleSavings += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abac7688a1d6c52dc96e04dd56827df60">getCallsiteCost</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a453497ae3e6c0033f5609b932d472b11">TTI</a>, this-&gt;CandidateCall, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aa28926a931a607351c475a9c093b0e6c">DL</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="945"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CycleSavings &#42;= &#42;CallerBFI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfo/#a45e6b2c5c4e59ddc05ad9a2685706e75">getBlockProfileCount</a>(CallerBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="946"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="947"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remove the cost of the cold basic blocks to model the runtime cost more</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="948"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// accurately. Both machine block placement and function splitting could</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="949"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// place cold blocks further from hot blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="950"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> - ColdSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="951"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="952"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Allow tiny callees to be inlined regardless of whether they meet the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="953"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// savings threshold.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="954"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> &gt; <a href="#ad51a15fba170bfb47cfb5831de1fad3a">InlineSizeAllowance</a> ? <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> - <a href="#ad51a15fba170bfb47cfb5831de1fad3a">InlineSizeAllowance</a> : 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="955"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="956"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OverrideCycleSavingsAndSizeForTesting(CycleSavings, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="957"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CostBenefit.emplace(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a>(128, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>), CycleSavings);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="958"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="959"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Let R be the ratio of CycleSavings to Size.  We accept the inlining</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="960"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// opportunity if R is really high and reject if R is really low.  If R is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="961"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// somewhere in the middle, we fall back to the cost-based analysis.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="962"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="963"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Specifically, let R = CycleSavings / Size, we accept the inlining</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00964" /><CodeLine lineNumber="964"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// opportunity if:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00965" /><CodeLine lineNumber="965"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00966" /><CodeLine lineNumber="966"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//             PSI-&gt;getOrCompHotCountThreshold()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00967" /><CodeLine lineNumber="967"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// R &gt; -------------------------------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="968"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     getInliningCostBenefitAnalysisSavingsMultiplier()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="969"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="970"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and reject the inlining opportunity if:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00971" /><CodeLine lineNumber="971"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="972"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                PSI-&gt;getOrCompHotCountThreshold()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="973"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// R &lt;= ----------------------------------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="974"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      getInliningCostBenefitAnalysisProfitableMultiplier()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="975"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="976"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, we fall back to the cost-based analysis.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="977"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="978"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Implementation-wise, use multiplication (CycleSavings &#42; Multiplier,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="979"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// HotCountThreshold &#42; Size) rather than division to avoid precision loss.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="980"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> Threshold(128, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a8c79183f67d088e0c9cd34511c3f848d">PSI</a>-&gt;getOrCompHotCountThreshold());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="981"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Threshold &#42;= <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="982"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="983"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> UpperBoundCycleSavings = CycleSavings;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="984"><span class="doxyHighlight">    UpperBoundCycleSavings &#42;= getInliningCostBenefitAnalysisSavingsMultiplier();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="985"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UpperBoundCycleSavings.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#af4b1ccc0b78f9da9f3f3944e06007f1d">uge</a>(Threshold))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="986"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="987"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="988"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> LowerBoundCycleSavings = CycleSavings;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="989"><span class="doxyHighlight">    LowerBoundCycleSavings &#42;=</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="990"><span class="doxyHighlight">        getInliningCostBenefitAnalysisProfitableMultiplier();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="991"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LowerBoundCycleSavings.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a545e8d5dfa1688acea0d0e275b03682f">ult</a>(Threshold))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="992"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="993"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="994"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, fall back to the cost-based analysis.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="995"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::nullopt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="996"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="997"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="998"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineresult">InlineResult</a> finalizeAnalysis()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> override </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00999" /><CodeLine lineNumber="999"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Loops generally act a lot like calls in that they act like barriers to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1000"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// movement, require a certain amount of setup, etc. So when optimising for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1001"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// size, we penalise any call sites that perform loops. We do this after all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1002"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// other costs here, so will likely only be dealing with relatively small</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1003"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// functions (and hence DT and LI will hopefully be cheap).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1004"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Caller = <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aaf27e0fe73330b76c1ffd00ea2116e78">CandidateCall</a>.getFunction();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1005"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Caller-&gt;hasMinSize()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1006"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> DT(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aa0d73af9a3aaefb80f59550a218c40f2">F</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1007"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> LI(DT);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1008"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumLoops = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1009"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;L : LI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1010"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ignore loops that will not be executed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1011"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a0d4623a1bd5b3ffd272898c0a9160f9f">DeadBlocks</a>.count(L-&gt;getHeader()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1012"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1013"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NumLoops++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1014"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1015"><span class="doxyHighlight">      addCost(NumLoops &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/inlineconstants/#a52751d994299ef16256d21b118eaaf82">InlineConstants::LoopPenalty</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1016"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1017"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1018"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We applied the maximum possible vector bonus at the beginning. Now,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1019"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// subtract the excess bonus, if any, from the Threshold before</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1020"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// comparing against Cost.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1021"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a5b7a6043a133a09e178d84fb077a28cf">NumVectorInstructions</a> &lt;= <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a779e8a97453bc9d5ab3a09e2be4b864d">NumInstructions</a> / 10)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1022"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Threshold -= VectorBonus;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1023"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a5b7a6043a133a09e178d84fb077a28cf">NumVectorInstructions</a> &lt;= <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a779e8a97453bc9d5ab3a09e2be4b864d">NumInstructions</a> / 2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1024"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Threshold -= VectorBonus / 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1025"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1026"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (std::optional&lt;int&gt; AttrCost =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1027"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a24380444e7b6b5af3e742282c87d4219">getStringFnAttrAsInt</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aaf27e0fe73330b76c1ffd00ea2116e78">CandidateCall</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;function-inline-cost&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1028"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> = &#42;AttrCost;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1030"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (std::optional&lt;int&gt; AttrCostMult = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a24380444e7b6b5af3e742282c87d4219">getStringFnAttrAsInt</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1035"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (std::optional&lt;int&gt; AttrThreshold =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1039"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Result = costBenefitAnalysis()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1040"><span class="doxyHighlight">      DecidedByCostBenefit = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1041"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (&#42;Result)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1042"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineresult/#a364fcb5fb838e7ca83b9fc379bcb4a0a">InlineResult::success</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1043"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1045"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1046"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1052"><span class="doxyHighlight">               ? <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineresult/#a364fcb5fb838e7ca83b9fc379bcb4a0a">InlineResult::success</a>()</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1056"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> shouldStop()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> override </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1057"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IgnoreThreshold || ComputeFullInlineCost)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1058"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1059"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Bail out the moment we cross the threshold. This means we&#39;ll under-count</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1060"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the cost, but only when undercounting doesn&#39;t matter.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1061"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> &lt; Threshold)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1062"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1063"><span class="doxyHighlight">    DecidedByCostThreshold = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1064"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1065"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
