<Link id="l01067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1067"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> onLoadEliminationOpportunity()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> override </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1068"><span class="doxyHighlight">    LoadEliminationCost += <a href="#abd4fe6436780bc5172e1f00bd5c3ceaf">InstrCost</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1069"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1070"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1071"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineresult">InlineResult</a> onAnalysisStart()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> override </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1072"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Perform some tweaks to the cost and threshold based on the direct</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1073"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// callsite information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1074"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1075"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We want to more aggressively inline vector-dense kernels, so up the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1076"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// threshold, and we&#39;ll lower it if the % of vector instructions gets too</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1077"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// low. Note that these bonuses are some what arbitrary and evolved over</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1078"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// time by accident as much as because they are principled bonuses.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1079"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1080"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: It would be nice to remove all such bonuses. At least it would be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1081"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// nice to base the bonus values on something more scientific.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1082"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a779e8a97453bc9d5ab3a09e2be4b864d">NumInstructions</a> == 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1083"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a5b7a6043a133a09e178d84fb077a28cf">NumVectorInstructions</a> == 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1084"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1085"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update the threshold based on callsite properties</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1086"><span class="doxyHighlight">    updateThreshold(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aaf27e0fe73330b76c1ffd00ea2116e78">CandidateCall</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aa0d73af9a3aaefb80f59550a218c40f2">F</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1087"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1088"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// While Threshold depends on commandline options that can take negative</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1089"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// values, we want to enforce the invariant that the computed threshold and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1090"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bonuses are non-negative.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1091"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Threshold &gt;= 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1092"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SingleBBBonus &gt;= 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1093"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(VectorBonus &gt;= 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1094"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1095"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Speculatively apply all possible bonuses to Threshold. If cost exceeds</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1096"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this Threshold any time, and cost cannot decrease, we can stop processing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1097"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the rest of the function body.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1098"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Threshold += (SingleBBBonus + VectorBonus);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1099"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1100"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Give out bonuses for the callsite, as the instructions setting them up</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1101"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will be gone after inlining.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1102"><span class="doxyHighlight">    addCost(-<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abac7688a1d6c52dc96e04dd56827df60">getCallsiteCost</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a453497ae3e6c0033f5609b932d472b11">TTI</a>, this-&gt;CandidateCall, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aa28926a931a607351c475a9c093b0e6c">DL</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1103"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1104"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this function uses the coldcc calling convention, prefer not to inline</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1105"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1106"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aa0d73af9a3aaefb80f59550a218c40f2">F</a>.getCallingConv() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca94ec9273479164e4aec1d5d91b71dc85">CallingConv::Cold</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1107"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/inlineconstants/#a169b2b8289fb0aefc607ae29c8b95cc6">InlineConstants::ColdccPenalty</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1109"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;      Initial cost: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1357"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// analyzer - instead, we should abstract it to a common method in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1358"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CallAnalyzer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1359"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SingleBBBonusPercent = 50;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1360"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VectorBonusPercent = <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a453497ae3e6c0033f5609b932d472b11">TTI</a>.getInlinerVectorBonusPercent();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1362"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Threshold &#42;= <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a453497ae3e6c0033f5609b932d472b11">TTI</a>.getInliningThresholdMultiplier();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1363"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SingleBBBonus = Threshold &#42; SingleBBBonusPercent / 100;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1364"><span class="doxyHighlight">    VectorBonus = Threshold &#42; VectorBonusPercent / 100;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1365"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Threshold += (SingleBBBonus + VectorBonus);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1490"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;AllocSize = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5f6182886dc2f96c204299e92c1565d5">dyn&#95;cast&#95;or&#95;null&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1491"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Sometimes a dynamic alloca could be converted into a static alloca</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1492"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// after this constant prop, and become a huge static alloca on an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1493"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unconditional CFG path. Avoid inlining if this is going to happen above</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1494"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a threshold.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1495"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: If the threshold is removed or lowered too much, we could end up</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1496"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// being too pessimistic and prevent inlining non-problematic code. This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1497"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// could result in unintended perf regressions. A better overall strategy</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1498"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is needed to track stack usage during inlining.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1499"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;Ty = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getAllocatedType();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1544"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1545"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0, e = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getNumIncomingValues(); i != e; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1546"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Pred = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getIncomingBlock(i);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1753"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is really weird. Technically, ptrtoint will disable SROA. However,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1757"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and so we can just add the integer in here. The only places where SROA is</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1833"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1834"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Is this an alloca in the caller?  This is distinct from the attribute case</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1835"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// above because attributes aren&#39;t updated within the inliner itself and we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1836"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// always want to catch the alloca derived case.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1837"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a7b78c476557e705479c1441daad05710">isAllocaDerivedArg</a>(V))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1838"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can actually predict the result of comparisons between an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1839"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// alloca-derived value and null. Note that this fires regardless of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1840"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SROA firing.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1841"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1842"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1843"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1844"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1845"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1846" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a944dede4b00a3db0322e30dd22af8cde"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a944dede4b00a3db0322e30dd22af8cde">CallAnalyzer::allowSizeGrowth</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1847"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the normal destination of the invoke or the parent block of the call</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1848"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// site is unreachable-terminated, there is little point in inlining this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1849"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unless there is literally zero cost.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1850"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: Note that it is possible that an unreachable-terminated block has a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1851"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// hot entry. For example, in below scenario inlining hot&#95;call&#95;X() may be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1852"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// beneficial :</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1853"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// main() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1854"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   hot&#95;call&#95;1();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1855"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1856"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   hot&#95;call&#95;N()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1857"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   exit(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1858"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1859"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For now, we are not handling this corner case here as it is rare in real</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1860"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// code. In future, we should elaborate this based on BPI and BFI in more</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1861"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// general threshold adjusting heuristics in updateThreshold().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1862"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/invokeinst">InvokeInst</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;InvokeInst&gt;</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1863"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;UnreachableInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>-&gt;getNormalDest()-&gt;getTerminator()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1864"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1865"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;UnreachableInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>.getParent()-&gt;getTerminator()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1866"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1867"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1868"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1940"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1941"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1942"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Various bonus percentages. These are multiplied by Threshold to get the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1943"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bonus values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1944"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SingleBBBonus: This bonus is applied if the callee has a single reachable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1945"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// basic block at the given callsite context. This is speculatively applied</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1946"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and withdrawn if more than one basic block is seen.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1947"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1948"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LstCallToStaticBonus: This large bonus is applied to ensure the inlining</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1949"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the last call to a static function as inlining such functions is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1950"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// guaranteed to reduce code size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1951"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1952"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// These bonus percentages may be set to 0 based on properties of the caller</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1953"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and the callsite.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1954"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SingleBBBonusPercent = 50;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1955"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VectorBonusPercent = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>.getInlinerVectorBonusPercent();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1956"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LastCallToStaticBonus = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>.getInliningLastCallToStaticBonus();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1957"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1958"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Lambda to set all the above bonus and bonus percentages to 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1959"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DisallowAllBonuses = &#91;&amp;&#93;() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1960"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SingleBBBonusPercent = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1961"><span class="doxyHighlight">    VectorBonusPercent = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1962"><span class="doxyHighlight">    LastCallToStaticBonus = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1963"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01964" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1964"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01965" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1965"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use the OptMinSizeThreshold or OptSizeThreshold knob if they are available</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01966" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1966"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and reduce the threshold if the caller has the necessary attribute.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01967" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1967"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a33e853ec74d48b1340d1d4bae772d30ba14e7dd71a82eb3c2500ac2687efef82b">Caller</a>-&gt;hasMinSize()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1968"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Threshold = MinIfValid(Threshold, Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/inlineparams/#a28b79b1b8e1c2f68da272b1778504be0">OptMinSizeThreshold</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1969"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For minsize, we want to disable the single BB bonus and the vector</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1970"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bonuses, but not the last-call-to-static bonus. Inlining the last call to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01971" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1971"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a static function will, at the minimum, eliminate the parameter setup and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1972"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// call/return instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1973"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SingleBBBonusPercent = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1974"><span class="doxyHighlight">    VectorBonusPercent = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1975"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a33e853ec74d48b1340d1d4bae772d30ba14e7dd71a82eb3c2500ac2687efef82b">Caller</a>-&gt;hasOptSize())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1976"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Threshold = MinIfValid(Threshold, Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/inlineparams/#a38e17a3379fe0336330cda390fd23fea">OptSizeThreshold</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1977"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1978"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Adjust the threshold based on inlinehint attribute and profile based</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1979"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// hotness information if the caller does not have MinSize attribute.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1980"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a33e853ec74d48b1340d1d4bae772d30ba14e7dd71a82eb3c2500ac2687efef82b">Caller</a>-&gt;hasMinSize()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1981"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a33e853ec74d48b1340d1d4bae772d30bac8ff9e15a93f800c74c05e7b37364816">Callee</a>.hasFnAttribute(Attribute::InlineHint))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1982"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Threshold = MaxIfValid(Threshold, Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/inlineparams/#ac5fa84316036c761096ad4f9a07ccca2">HintThreshold</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1983"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1984"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: After switching to the new passmanager, simplify the logic below</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1985"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by checking only the callsite hotness/coldness as we will reliably</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1986"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// have local profile information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1987"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1988"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Callsite hotness and coldness can be determined if sample profile is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1989"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// used (which adds hotness metadata to calls) or if caller&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1990"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// BlockFrequencyInfo is available.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1991"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfo">BlockFrequencyInfo</a> &#42;CallerBFI = GetBFI ? &amp;(GetBFI(&#42;Caller)) : nullptr;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1992"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a24bb1dc23ba6611e67f881d3c6c3506a">HotCallSiteThreshold</a> = getHotCallSiteThreshold(<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>, CallerBFI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1993"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a33e853ec74d48b1340d1d4bae772d30ba14e7dd71a82eb3c2500ac2687efef82b">Caller</a>-&gt;hasOptSize() &amp;&amp; <a href="#a24bb1dc23ba6611e67f881d3c6c3506a">HotCallSiteThreshold</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1994"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Hot callsite.\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1995"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: This should update the threshold only if it exceeds the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1996"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// current threshold, but AutoFDO + ThinLTO currently relies on this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1997"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// behavior to prevent inlining of hot callsites during ThinLTO</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1998"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// compile phase.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01999" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1999"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Threshold = &#42;<a href="#a24bb1dc23ba6611e67f881d3c6c3506a">HotCallSiteThreshold</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2000"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/globalopt-cpp/#a652ede21e988a4de569cdbc7863ea234">isColdCallSite</a>(<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>, CallerBFI)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2001"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Cold callsite.\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2002"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do not apply bonuses for a cold callsite including the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2003"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LastCallToStatic bonus. While this bonus might result in code size</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2004"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reduction, it can cause the size of a non-cold caller to increase</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2005"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// preventing it from being inlined.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2006"><span class="doxyHighlight">      DisallowAllBonuses();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2007"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Threshold = MinIfValid(Threshold, Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/inlineparams/#a5be58f238f61d418cfa212e7768c8ea3">ColdCallSiteThreshold</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2008"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PSI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2009"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use callee&#39;s global profile information only if we have no way of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2010"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// determining this via callsite information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2011"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PSI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/profilesummaryinfo/#a55d31db902636df919d451f2b5859f50">isFunctionEntryHot</a>(&amp;Callee)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2012"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Hot callee.\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2013"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If callsite hotness can not be determined, we may still know</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2014"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that the callee is hot and treat it as a weaker hint for threshold</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2015"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// increase.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2016"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Threshold = MaxIfValid(Threshold, Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/inlineparams/#ac5fa84316036c761096ad4f9a07ccca2">HintThreshold</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2017"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PSI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/profilesummaryinfo/#af813576f394d690d9d51ca46810eaf87">isFunctionEntryCold</a>(&amp;Callee)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2018"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Cold callee.\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2019"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do not apply bonuses for a cold callee including the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2020"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LastCallToStatic bonus. While this bonus might result in code size</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2021"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reduction, it can cause the size of a non-cold caller to increase</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2022"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// preventing it from being inlined.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2023"><span class="doxyHighlight">        DisallowAllBonuses();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2024"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Threshold = MinIfValid(Threshold, Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/inlineparams/#a709f2e88554f9b1dc20e16371813aa84">ColdThreshold</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2025"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2026"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2027"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2028"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2029"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Threshold += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>.adjustInliningThreshold(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2030"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2031"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Finally, take the target-specific inlining threshold multiplier into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2032"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// account.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2033"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Threshold &#42;= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>.getInliningThresholdMultiplier();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2034"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2035"><span class="doxyHighlight">  SingleBBBonus = Threshold &#42; SingleBBBonusPercent / 100;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2036"><span class="doxyHighlight">  VectorBonus = Threshold &#42; VectorBonusPercent / 100;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2037"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2038"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there is only one call of the function, and it has internal linkage,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2039"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the cost of inlining it drops dramatically. It may seem odd to update</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2040"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Cost in updateThreshold, but the bonus depends on the logic in this method.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2041"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-inlinecost-cpp-/#aaa4a24113a96ba45e9dc3e45a42a5b57">isSoleCallToLocalFunction</a>(<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2042"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> -= LastCallToStaticBonus;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2043"><span class="doxyHighlight">    StaticBonusApplied = LastCallToStaticBonus;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2044"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2045"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2046"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2047" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aee291a74c02dc725df8472084fab1377"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aee291a74c02dc725df8472084fab1377">CallAnalyzer::visitCmpInst</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst">CmpInst</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2048"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;LHS = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getOperand(0), &#42;RHS = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getOperand(1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2049"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First try to handle simplified comparisons.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2050"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a57feb935aaafd1bd4bfbb8dc56ad2129">simplifyInstruction</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2051"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2052"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2053"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getOpcode() == Instruction::FCmp)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2054"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2055"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2056"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise look for a comparison between constant offset pointers with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2057"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a common base.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2233"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Try to simplify a call site.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2234"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2235"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Takes a concrete function and callsite and tries to actually simplify it by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2236"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// analyzing the arguments and call itself with instsimplify. Returns true if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2237"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// it has simplified the callsite to some other entity (a constant), making it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2238"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// free.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2239" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a5d4c970d99f3ffebfe1e07a3be697b09"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a5d4c970d99f3ffebfe1e07a3be697b09">CallAnalyzer::simplifyCallSite</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aa0d73af9a3aaefb80f59550a218c40f2">F</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2240"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: Using the instsimplify logic directly for this is inefficient</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2241"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// because we have to continually rebuild the argument list even when no</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2483"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2484"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Assume the most general case where the switch is lowered into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2485"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// either a jump table, bit test, or a balanced binary tree consisting of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2486"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// case clusters without merging adjacent clusters with the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2487"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// destination. We do not consider the switches that are lowered with a mix</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2488"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of jump table/bit test/binary search tree. The cost of the switch is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2489"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// proportional to the size of the tree or the size of jump table range.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2490"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2491"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NB: We convert large switches which are just used to initialize large phi</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2492"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// nodes to lookup tables instead in simplifycfg, so this shouldn&#39;t prevent</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2493"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inlining those. It will prevent inlining in cases where the optimization</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2494"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// does not (yet) fire.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2495"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2496"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> JumpTableSize = 0;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2506"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We never want to inline functions that contain an indirectbr.  This is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2507"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// incorrect because all the blockaddress&#39;s (in static global initializers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2508"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for example) would be referring to the original function, and this</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2558"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Analyze a basic block for its contribution to the inline cost.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2559"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2560"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This method walks the analyzer over every instruction in the given basic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2561"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// block and accounts for their cost during inlining at this callsite. It</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2562"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// aborts early if the threshold has been exceeded or an impossible to inline</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2565"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineresult">InlineResult</a></span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2569"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: Currently, the number of instructions in a function regardless of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2570"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// our ability to simplify them during inline to constants or dead code,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2690"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Find dead blocks due to deleted CFG edges during inlining.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2691"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2692"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If we know the successor of the current block, \\p CurrBB, has to be \\p</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2693"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// NextBB, the other successors of \\p CurrBB are dead if these successors have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2694"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// no live incoming CFG edges.  If one block is found to be dead, we can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2695"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// continue growing the dead block list by checking the successors of the dead</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2696"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// blocks to see if all their incoming edges are dead or not.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2697" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#af5c8e1b8ca1f8eb101829d9fe2062c4e"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#af5c8e1b8ca1f8eb101829d9fe2062c4e">CallAnalyzer::findDeadBlocks</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;CurrBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;NextBB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2698"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsEdgeDead = &#91;&amp;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Pred, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Succ) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2699"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A CFG edge is dead if the predecessor is dead or the predecessor has a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2700"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// known successor which is not the one under exam.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2701"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a0d4623a1bd5b3ffd272898c0a9160f9f">DeadBlocks</a>.count(Pred))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2708"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If all the edges to a block are dead, the block is also dead.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2716"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2717"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 4&gt;</a> NewDead;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2720"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Dead = NewDead.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a0c8ffe664a36e30d49c84d0aded2fe08">pop&#95;back&#95;val</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2722"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Continue growing the dead block lists.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2723"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;S : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a26e2a938b431eaa6eca2beaa96410c9d">successors</a>(Dead))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2729"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2730"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Analyze a call site for potential inlining.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2731"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2732"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Returns true if inlining this call is viable, and false if it is not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2733"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// viable. It computes the cost and adjusts the threshold based on numerous</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2734"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// factors and heuristics. If this method returns false but the computed cost</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2735"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// is below the computed threshold, then inlining was forcibly disabled by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2736"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// some artifact of the routine.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2737" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a75514cc4632af88b58a31912c8bd9ecc"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineresult">InlineResult</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a75514cc4632af88b58a31912c8bd9ecc">CallAnalyzer::analyze</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2738"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ++NumCallsAnalyzed;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2739"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2740"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Result = <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a562c4d99c3b86a6aed450011e796e2bf">onAnalysisStart</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2741"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Result.isSuccess())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2781"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2782"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: If a caller has multiple calls to a callee, we end up recomputing</span></CodeLine>
