<Link id="l02785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2785"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;const Value &#42;, 32&gt;</a> EphValues;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2786"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codemetrics/#a7e174506b52ad46ea1f746a7f727d999">CodeMetrics::collectEphemeralValues</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aa0d73af9a3aaefb80f59550a218c40f2">F</a>, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#acbdd4c0e06dc866ad2e68d57e194743e">GetAssumptionCache</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aa0d73af9a3aaefb80f59550a218c40f2">F</a>), EphValues);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2787"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2788"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The worklist of live basic blocks in the callee &#42;after&#42; inlining. We avoid</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2789"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// adding basic blocks of the callee which can be proven to be dead for this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2790"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// particular call site in order to get more accurate cost estimates. This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2791"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// requires a somewhat heavyweight iteration pattern: we need to walk the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2792"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// basic blocks in a breadth-first order as we insert live successors. To</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2793"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// accomplish this, prioritizing for small iterations because we exit after</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2794"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// crossing our threshold, we use a small-size optimized SetVector.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2795"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typedef</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallsetvector">SmallSetVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 16&gt;</a> BBSetVector;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2796"><span class="doxyHighlight">  BBSetVector BBWorklist;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2797"><span class="doxyHighlight">  BBWorklist.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/setvector/#af34eb71cc483e84d2eca80575cb9ccde">insert</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aa0d73af9a3aaefb80f59550a218c40f2">F</a>.getEntryBlock());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2798"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2799"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that we &#42;must not&#42; cache the size, this loop grows the worklist.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2800"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Idx = 0; Idx != BBWorklist.size(); ++Idx) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2801"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#af55600dce1a5561029506eaeb04db883">shouldStop</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2802"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2803"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2804"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB = BBWorklist&#91;Idx&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2805"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a266367eb01c634406b32f816d2d9c6bf">empty</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2806"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2807"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2808"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a5b9315ae40e6ab186a2ab8f8fbebcb00">onBlockStart</a>(BB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2809"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2810"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Disallow inlining a blockaddress with uses other than strictly callbr.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2811"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A blockaddress only has defined behavior for an indirect branch in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2812"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// same function, and we do not currently support inlining indirect</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2813"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// branches.  But, the inliner may not see an indirect branch that ends up</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2814"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// being dead code at a particular call site. If the blockaddress escapes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2815"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the function, e.g., via a global variable, inlining may lead to an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2816"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// invalid cross-function reference.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2817"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: pr/39560: continue relaxing this overt restriction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2818"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a315f26c899f5ea8a780db4740ba95ef4">hasAddressTaken</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2819"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> &#42;U : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockaddress/#af6e2f535824d8f9b4bf1b1a75e5ab57c">BlockAddress::get</a>(&amp;&#42;BB)-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/ivusers-cpp/#ac2f338c3f467b3d09613e190d73044a5">users</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2820"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;CallBrInst&gt;</a>(&#42;U))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2821"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineresult/#a77027fdc657b15aa5dd3d022e0fc07d3">InlineResult::failure</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;blockaddress used outside of callbr&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2822"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2823"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Analyze the cost of this block. If we blow through the threshold, this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2824"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// returns false, and we can bail on out.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2825"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineresult">InlineResult</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizer-cpp/#a05ab4853f7153e537774d02580e761ec">IR</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#ace15c0f86fa672d5a700a5f76b8b43e9">analyzeBlock</a>(BB, EphValues);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2826"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizer-cpp/#a05ab4853f7153e537774d02580e761ec">IR</a>.isSuccess())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2827"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizer-cpp/#a05ab4853f7153e537774d02580e761ec">IR</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2828"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2829"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;TI = BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#aef9e9fcf4c5dfce90276ca16d91b8e46">getTerminator</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2830"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2831"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add in the live successors by first checking whether we have terminator</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2832"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that may be simplified based on the values simplified by this call.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2833"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst">BranchInst</a> &#42;BI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;BranchInst&gt;</a>(TI)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2834"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BI-&gt;isConditional()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2835"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a193847098793cdbab306803186676899">Cond</a> = BI-&gt;getCondition();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2836"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantint">ConstantInt</a> &#42;SimpleCond =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2837"><span class="doxyHighlight">                <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5f6182886dc2f96c204299e92c1565d5">dyn&#95;cast&#95;or&#95;null&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aae6549033be6c24910989a2f8d4952b0">SimplifiedValues</a>.lookup(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a193847098793cdbab306803186676899">Cond</a>))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2838"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;NextBB = BI-&gt;getSuccessor(SimpleCond-&gt;isZero() ? 1 : 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2839"><span class="doxyHighlight">          BBWorklist.insert(NextBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2840"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a0bae74199b4bcb353a5ae36e9136a368">KnownSuccessors</a>&#91;BB&#93; = NextBB;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2841"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#af5c8e1b8ca1f8eb101829d9fe2062c4e">findDeadBlocks</a>(BB, NextBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2842"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2843"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2844"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2845"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/switchinst">SwitchInst</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;SwitchInst&gt;</a>(TI)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2846"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a193847098793cdbab306803186676899">Cond</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>-&gt;getCondition();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2847"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantint">ConstantInt</a> &#42;SimpleCond =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2848"><span class="doxyHighlight">              <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5f6182886dc2f96c204299e92c1565d5">dyn&#95;cast&#95;or&#95;null&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aae6549033be6c24910989a2f8d4952b0">SimplifiedValues</a>.lookup(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a193847098793cdbab306803186676899">Cond</a>))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2849"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;NextBB = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>-&gt;findCaseValue(SimpleCond)-&gt;getCaseSuccessor();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2850"><span class="doxyHighlight">        BBWorklist.insert(NextBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2851"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a0bae74199b4bcb353a5ae36e9136a368">KnownSuccessors</a>&#91;BB&#93; = NextBB;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2852"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#af5c8e1b8ca1f8eb101829d9fe2062c4e">findDeadBlocks</a>(BB, NextBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2853"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2854"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2855"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2856"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2857"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we&#39;re unable to select a particular successor, just count all of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2858"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2859"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Succ : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a26e2a938b431eaa6eca2beaa96410c9d">successors</a>(BB))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2860"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BBWorklist.insert(Succ);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2861"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2862"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a37d759f043baaec8ec56bfc32e37b542">onBlockAnalyzed</a>(BB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2863"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2864"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2865"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this is a noduplicate call, we can still inline as long as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2866"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inlining this would cause the removal of the caller (so the instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2867"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is not actually duplicated, just moved).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2868"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-inlinecost-cpp-/#aaa4a24113a96ba45e9dc3e45a42a5b57">isSoleCallToLocalFunction</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aaf27e0fe73330b76c1ffd00ea2116e78">CandidateCall</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#aa0d73af9a3aaefb80f59550a218c40f2">F</a>) &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#a9600de48f592771fe50cad7071b6fcb3">ContainsNoDuplicateCall</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2869"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineresult/#a77027fdc657b15aa5dd3d022e0fc07d3">InlineResult::failure</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;noduplicate&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2870"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2871"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the callee&#39;s stack size exceeds the user-specified threshold,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2872"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// do not let it be inlined.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2873"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The command line option overrides a limit set in the function attributes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2874"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FinalStackSizeThreshold = <a href="#a5e2872a6754754edd122ed397dcc68ad">StackSizeThreshold</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2875"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="#a5e2872a6754754edd122ed397dcc68ad">StackSizeThreshold</a>.getNumOccurrences())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2876"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (std::optional&lt;int&gt; AttrMaxStackSize = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a24380444e7b6b5af3e742282c87d4219">getStringFnAttrAsInt</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2878"><span class="doxyHighlight">      FinalStackSizeThreshold = &#42;AttrMaxStackSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2879"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/callanalyzer/#ae50139d45349e59707efe9f1aa1dbb56">AllocatedSize</a> &gt; FinalStackSizeThreshold)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2880"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineresult/#a77027fdc657b15aa5dd3d022e0fc07d3">InlineResult::failure</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;stacksize&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2906"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Dump stats about this call&#39;s analysis.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2907" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/inlinecostcallanalyzer/#aabcb13bec5e6f9ba8dc996af8a10cc10"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#aa863693eef567397d9c292da5bf22d34">LLVM&#95;DUMP&#95;METHOD</a> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/inlinecostcallanalyzer/#aabcb13bec5e6f9ba8dc996af8a10cc10">InlineCostCallAnalyzer::dump</a>() &#123; <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinecost-cpp-/inlinecostcallanalyzer/#a2c1cb0941fc8289abfffced96bb006f6">print</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>()); &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2909"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2910"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Test that there are no attribute conflicts between Caller and Callee</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2911"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        that prevent inlining.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2912" lineLink="#ad6e6415d4d2e809c620d08fb23c1544f"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#ad6e6415d4d2e809c620d08fb23c1544f">functionsHaveCompatibleAttributes</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2913"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;Caller, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;Callee, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2914"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function-ref">function&#95;ref</a>&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetlibraryinfo">TargetLibraryInfo</a> &amp;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;)&gt; &amp;GetTLI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2915"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that CalleeTLI must be a copy not a reference. The legacy pass manager</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2916"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// caches the most recently created TLI in the TargetLibraryInfoWrapperPass</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2917"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// object, and always returns the same object (which is overwritten on each</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2918"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// GetTLI call). Therefore we copy the first result.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2919"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CalleeTLI = GetTLI(&#42;Callee);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2920"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a94cba06a633881068835d763f3ae3dee">IgnoreTTIInlineCompatible</a> ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2921"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>.areInlineCompatible(Caller, Callee)) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2922"><span class="doxyHighlight">         GetTLI(&#42;Caller).areInlineCompatible(CalleeTLI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2923"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                             <a href="#a57032bf75155bd7c0b9e53e9f0c96f04">InlineCallerSupersetNoBuiltin</a>) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2924"><span class="doxyHighlight">         AttributeFuncs::areInlineCompatible(&#42;Caller, &#42;Callee);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2925"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2926"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2927" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abac7688a1d6c52dc96e04dd56827df60"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abac7688a1d6c52dc96e04dd56827df60">llvm::getCallsiteCost</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2928"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2929"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2930"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0, E = <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>.arg&#95;size(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != E; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2931"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>.isByValArgument(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2932"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We approximate the number of loads and stores needed by dividing the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2933"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// size of the byval type by the target&#39;s pointer size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2934"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pointertype">PointerType</a> &#42;PTy = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;PointerType&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>.getArgOperand(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)-&gt;getType());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2935"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize">TypeSize</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getTypeSizeInBits(<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>.getParamByValType(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2936"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AS = PTy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pointertype/#af8aeced5e71d2589fa3e9791043af5cb">getAddressSpace</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2937"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PointerSize = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getPointerSizeInBits(AS);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2938"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ceiling division.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2939"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumStores = (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize">TypeSize</a> + PointerSize - 1) / PointerSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2940"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2941"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If it generates more than 8 stores it is likely to be expanded as an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2942"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inline memcpy so we take that as an upper bound. Otherwise we assume</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2943"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// one load and one store per word copied.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2944"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: The maxStoresPerMemcpy setting from the target should be used</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2945"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// here instead of a magic number of 8, but it&#39;s not available via</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2946"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DataLayout.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2947"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NumStores = std::min(NumStores, 8U);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2948"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2949"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> += 2 &#42; NumStores &#42; <a href="#abd4fe6436780bc5172e1f00bd5c3ceaf">InstrCost</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2950"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2951"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For non-byval arguments subtract off one instruction per call</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2952"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// argument.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2953"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> += <a href="#abd4fe6436780bc5172e1f00bd5c3ceaf">InstrCost</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2954"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2955"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2956"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The call instruction also disappears after inlining.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2957"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> += <a href="#abd4fe6436780bc5172e1f00bd5c3ceaf">InstrCost</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2958"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>.getInlineCallPenalty(<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>.getCaller(), <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>, <a href="#a163d0cfa6f179b946914da015582985f">CallPenalty</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2959"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2960"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::min&lt;int64&#95;t&gt;(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>, INT&#95;MAX);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2961"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2962"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2963" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5f5f248d08aa55c63e5bc7a8304a7319"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinecost">InlineCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5f5f248d08aa55c63e5bc7a8304a7319">llvm::getInlineCost</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Always make cost benefit based decision explicit.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3225"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3226"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Set the OptMinSizeThreshold and OptSizeThreshold params only if the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3227"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -inlinehint-threshold commandline option is not explicitly given. If that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3228"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// option is present, then its value applies even for callees with size and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3229"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// minsize attributes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3230"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the -inline-threshold is not specified, set the ColdThreshold from the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3231"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -inlinecold-threshold even if it is not explicitly passed. If</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3232"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -inline-threshold is specified, then -inlinecold-threshold needs to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3233"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// explicitly specified to set the ColdThreshold knob</span></CodeLine>
